name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A 40-year-old woman, who suffered from lupus and other diseases, had been suffering for many years and finally went to Switzerland to choose euthanasia. Today is her last day. She raised her glass and celebrated life in the face of death. Her homepage left more than a dozen videos telling her philosophy of life and death and how to live.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 24, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky delivered his daily address to the public wearing a T-shirt that read "Make Russia Small Again." The T-shirt also showed a map of the Principality of Moscow in 1462 and compared it to the current size of the Russian Federation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 24, a Xiaomi SU7 owner clashed with a group of motorcyclists outside a motorcycle shop in Tongzhou District, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province. He then drove his car into the motorcycle shop, damaging dozens of motorcycles and stabbing one person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to media reports, the 33-year-old Uyghur director Ikram was arrested by the police from Beijing and returned to Xinjiang in May 2023. The charge was that he "actively participated in terrorist activities" while studying in Turkey from 2010 to 2016. He was sentenced to 6 years in prison.
Ikram is a talented filmmaker whose works have won many international awards and has cooperated with Tencent, Xiaohongshu, Samsung Mobile Phones, and "13 Invitations". He lived in Beijing before his arrest.
It is reported that Ikram's appeal will be heard in court soon.
